PKS Persilakan PAN yang Ingin Koalisi dengan NasDem-PDIP
06 Nov 2019, 09:21 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - PKS tak mempermasalahkan PAN yang ingin membahas Pilpres 2024 bersama NasDem dan PDIP. PKS sebagai eks rekan koalisi PAN di Pilpres 2019 menyatakan semua partai bebas membangun koalisi dengan partai manapun.
"Monggo. Semua bebas. Tiap partai bebas membangun koalisi dengan partai manapun. Tapi 2024 masih lama," kata Ketua DPP PKS Mardani Ali Sera kepada wartawan, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Mardani mengatakan saat ini PKS akan fokus menjaga aspirasi publik dan melayani masyarakat. Selain itu, dengan posisi PKS yang berada di luar pemerintahan, Mardani menegaskan partainya akan tetap memberikan kritik yang konstruktif.
"Untuk PKS fokus sekarang melayani masyarakat. Dengan suara bertambah 3,5 juta, PKS berkewajiban menjaga aspirasi publik agar BPJS tidak naik, pendidikan berkualitas, iklim keagamaan berkembang, dan kian saling menghargai. Plus pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia naik ke 6-7 persen. Dengan berperan sebagai #KamiOposisi kritis dan konstruktif," ujarnya.
Sebelumnya diberitakan, PAN memastikan akan mengadakan pertemuan dengan Partai Nasional Demokrat (NasDem) dan PDIP. Ketua Umum PAN Zulkifli Hasan mengatakan salah satu hal yang akan dibahas dalam pertemuan dengan dua partai itu, yakni tentang Pilpres 2024.
"Kalau silaturahmi partai lain itu kan pasti, namanya partai politik. Mulai lihat-lihat nanti bagaimana. Kan 2024 sebentar nyampe, itu nggak terasa, kan banyak yang dibicarakan, UU (undang-undang) juga," ujar Zulkifli di Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11).
Bahkan Zulkilfli menyebut NasDem dan PDIP ingin bekerja sama dengan PAN di Pilpres 2024. "PDIP juga kok, sama aja," sebutnya ketika ditanyai kemungkinan NasDem berkoalisi dengan PAN di Pilpres 2024.

(azr/zap)

PKS Invites PAN to Want a Coalition with NasDem-PDIP
Nov 6, 2019, 09:21 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - PKS has no problem with PAN who wants to discuss the 2024 Presidential Election with NasDem and PDIP. PKS as a former PAN coalition partner in the 2019 Presidential Election stated that all parties were free to build coalitions with any party.
"Monggo. All are free. Each party is free to build coalitions with any party. But 2024 is still long," PKS DPP Chairman Mardani Ali Sera told reporters on Wednesday (6/11/2019).
Mardani said that currently PKS will focus on maintaining public aspirations and serving the community. In addition, with the PKS's position outside the government, Mardani insisted his party would continue to provide constructive criticism.
"For PKS, the focus is now serving the community. With a vote of 3.5 million, PKS is obliged to maintain public aspirations so that BPJS does not rise, quality education, religious climate develops, and increasingly respectful. Plus Indonesia's economic growth rises to 6-7 percent. With "We play a critical and constructive position," he said.
Previously reported, PAN ensured that it would hold a meeting with the Democratic National Party (NasDem) and PDIP. PAN Chairman Zulkifli Hasan said one of the things to be discussed in the meeting with the two parties was the 2024 Presidential Election.
"If the gathering of other parties is certain, the name is a political party. Start to see what will happen. In 2024, it will not be there, it will not be felt, there is a lot of discussion about it, the Law (the law) as well," said Zulkifli in the MPR / DPR Complex , Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday (5/11).
Zulkilfli even said that NasDem and PDIP want to work with PAN in the 2024 Presidential Election. "PDIP is really just the same," he said when asked about the possibility of NasDem forming a coalition with PAN in the 2024 Presidential Election.
